Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: Turning off the "energy saver" seting resulted in a 100% better picture. Toshiba dropped the ball in not explaining the difference seen in the picture when this setting is changed. Plus they make it almost impossible to even access the setting by graying out the highlite tab for it.Seems as if Toshiba doesn't want people to make their own choices in this area but would prefer to decide for us.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value
Reviews.Author: D. Watland
Reviews.Content: I am current using this as a monitor for my Mac Mini.  But I also attached an antenna and was delighted to have over 30 digital channels available over the air- what a bonus.  There is a need to adjust the settings as others have mentioned, but that is a small compromise for such a nice TV.

Reviews.Title: Nice Television for the Money
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Geinzer
Reviews.Content: The set up was quick and easy.  We got the picture right where we like the brightness.  It is a bit slow to come on, but that is not consequential.  This is our second TV and smaller (32"), but is used just as much.The price was right and delivery was ahead of schedule over the holidays.  We are very pleased with this set.

Reviews.Title: HD TV
Reviews.Author: Don Pope
Reviews.Content: The price was 1/3rd of a local buy and it was delivered to the door in 2 days! I can now start to learn the game of football because I can actually SEE the BALL, due to 32" screen and high definition.

Reviews.Title: Fav Shows look 32" Bigger!
Reviews.Author: Bernice M. Hall
Reviews.Content: I was having a hard time seeing my favorite shows...especially if there were subtitles or written commentary. Perfect size for the size of the room, I can see my shows so much better and the price was amazing. Great clarity and many options for viewing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent. A real bargain.
Reviews.Author: philo_vance
Reviews.Content: CNET has a very good review of this TV, as well as suggested Picture Settings based on their own calibration. I think both are right on target. Just Google: "cnet Toshiba 32C120U" (no quotes, of course) and you'll find it immediately. The Picture Settings are linked at the top of the second page of their review. See also the tip in the top review here on Amazon (by Mark Fellows) about turning off Auto Brightness in Preferences->Energy Saving Settings. It makes a *huge* difference. If you don't perform this step, you're likely to find the picture too dark.I just love mine. It replaced an old Olevia 27" in my bedroom and I can't believe the difference. Bright, sharp, saturated image with great contrast and black levels, it's a pleasure to watch.The sound is OK but not great. It's good enough for me. If you're an audiophile, you may be disappointed, but it has both Digital and Analog Audio Out jacks, so you can hook it up to a sound system if you like.It has 2 HDMI inputs, so you can connect your Roku or Blu-Ray in addition to the cable box.The stand is a simple pedestal. It does not tilt, turn or pivot.If a product has more than 100 reviews and the other reviewers have mostly gotten it right, I won't usually bother to write another one. I'm so pleased with this set, that I had to add my 2 cents. For 200 bucks, I think it's an amazing bargain.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: ristak2
Reviews.Content: It's not a bad TV, especially for the price and decent brand name. But some issues are that sound isn't all that great, and it's very slow to power up and change channels. As this is my first HDTV, I thought the slow speed may be due to switching to an HDTV but recently bought a Panasonic and that TV is much faster than this Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32-inch HDTV
Reviews.Author: wakkedup
Reviews.Content: So far, I haven't had any issues with my new TV.  Connects easily, works good connected to my media center PC as well as for my basic cable TV, my Apple TV, my XBox360, and anything else I've connected to it.  I like the mute function that this TV has, as it mutes the volume 50% of what I have it on the first 'mute' button press for when I just want to quiet the TV down for a time, or the second press will completely mute it for when I don't want to listen to commercials or what-have-you.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba
Reviews.Author: Donna Jackson
Reviews.Content: It is a great product.  Some of the screen can be lighter than you want.  I haven't learned how to adjust.  All in all, for the price, a great pick

Reviews.Title: Good tv for the price
Reviews.Author: Abeames1
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised when I purchased this tv.  It has very good picture and sound quality for the price.  The remote has oddly positioned buttons, but that's not an overly big deal.  The quality isn't as good when compared to my sony tv, but you get what you pay for and in this case you get a quality tv for a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Far Exceeded Expectations
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Galen "Rich Galen"
Reviews.Content: I have been on the prowl for a 32" HDTV for about a month for my office.  I checked the local Best Buy disposal aisle every weekend as well as Amazon & eBay listings.  I finally decided on this Toshiba based upon the combination of price and customer satisfaction.It arrived on time and in excellent shape.  Set up was not more than 10 minutes, including attaching the base.  The picture quality is excellent especially the anti-glare screen that means I don't have to tinker with the blinds behind my desk all day.

Reviews.Title: Nice for the $$
Reviews.Author: Joseph K. Velosa
Reviews.Content: Great picture and the sound is ok.  Using an exterior sound system so not that important to me.  I wish the back lighting could be a bit brighter and I've got all the settings up pretty high but all in all, for the monies, it's nice set!

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32C120U 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD HDTV (Black)
Reviews.Author: Counselor in the Midwest
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the picture clarity, overall quality and sound!  I would definitely purchase this model Toshiba again!

Reviews.Title: Good value as your extra TV
Reviews.Author: David E. Dusenbury
Reviews.Content: Not as feature-packed or picture-perfect as some higher priced brands/models but parked in front of our basement exercise machine it's a huge winner. Shipping was prompt and set-up was super-simple though we did have to run out and buy the HDMI cable which our old basement TV didn't require. It has performed perfectly for weeks now with no glitches or adjustments of any kind.

Reviews.Title: Finally get to love this thing
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Got this particular tv because of the size screen and quality of picture especially at the price I couldn't resist. Originally thought my mother would finally be able to watch movies again and be able to see the picture. Unfortunately I had a hard time getting the picture to show up in color. Mom never got to watch it... she died before the color part was working. However, now that its working properly I can't complain a bit.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the money
Reviews.Author: S. Appleton
Reviews.Content: This is the 2nd of this model we've purchased. We have them in ours and the spare bedroom. Once you turn off Auto brightness you can adjust the picture settings and this TV has a great picture. Not as good as the plasma in our living room but a great picture for a $199 32" LCD.Sound is excellent for a flatscreen TV, and we have mini-HTPC's connected to each TV and they display HD and BluRay content w/o any issues.

Reviews.Title: NICE
Reviews.Author: dude
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace my computer monitor,it is great with a little tweeking crystal clear picture ,use the HDMI input and not a problem well worth the $spent

Reviews.Title: Great Price
Reviews.Author: Brenda McCafferty
Reviews.Content: The t.v. was just mounted on the wall two days ago but so far everything is grea!!! The photo, sound, and quality all seem really goodl.  My only concern is the long term quality but time will tell.

Reviews.Title: Had to get an andapter
Reviews.Author: Cleutus Purcell "Don Irwin"
Reviews.Content: A product as new as this one should have a built in adapter which would avoid my having to use two remote controls to operate.

Reviews.Title: Awesome picture
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: I have a 40" Samsung that I purchased two years, the picture on the Toshiba is every bit as good as the Samsung.  I had to make a few adjustments to the brightness etc, but I do that with every TV.  It has all the input and outputs that anyone can need.  Setup took about 15 minutes, including connecting our Wii, surround sound and satellite. We like it so well, that we purchased another for our son for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32"
Reviews.Author: debby holguin
Reviews.Content: my husband christmas present.it got here in fourty eight hours and was easy to hook up to Direct TV and as they they say the rest is history . This was for our bedroom and he is happy remote and all

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Richard Brooks
Reviews.Content: TV is great.  For some reason my WII is only black and white and not in color and leads from WII is connected correcyly.

Reviews.Title: Lovely PC monitor :)
Reviews.Author: Vasil
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I wanted that tv for a monitor on my pc, and i love it, picture is great, and can't beat the price :)

Reviews.Title: Just got this TV. Everything is in good order.
Reviews.Author: uj
Reviews.Content: I just got this TV today, two days after I had placed my order. Set up was easy and intuitive. Picture quality is satisfactory, bright, sharp, excellent contrast and image is in focus. Color is vivid, just fine. Sound is crisp and clear. So my first impression on this TV is very positive. I hope it will maintain this level of performance for several years at least.

Reviews.Title: This TV honestly displays the transmitted images!
Reviews.Author: C. Hintz "Om Gate"
Reviews.Content: I would give it 5 stars if the TV "lied" by expanding and enhancing lower definition picture transmissions to make them look like what they are not - HDTV of sorts.  But then I love the honesty in this TV.  And, it picked up ALL the over-the-air Digital TV Stations in the San Francisco Metro Market - like a choice of 89 selections.  All of the real HDTV stations look GREAT.If the TV station is "stuffing ZEROs" into the stream to make a 960/540 picture look bigger then this TV displays the smaller "boxed" 960x540 (and boxes the 1024x576 EDTV that I advocated at SMPTE in Pasadena back in 1998).  and the diced up 720x408 pictures (6 different programs on one channel) look just awful expanded to full screen!  I LOVE it!  Honesty in a display!For sports, 1280x720 displays as an "honest" full screen picture.  This set is PERFECT for sports TV. 5 stars. But then I do NOT watch sports of any kind.  Since we only watch TV a couple of times a month for off-the-air news, this is great!All flat screens require external bookshelf speakers and a stereo or Dolby 5.1 amp so there is no disappointment with the typical flat screen internal make-do speakers.For the price, it can't be beat!

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32C120U 32-inch 720p LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Ralph Burgess
Reviews.Content: Toshiba 32C120U 32-inch 720p LCD HDTV:The right price and delivery was on time. Setup one of the LCD screen, plug it in, works great!

Reviews.Title: Perfect Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: shaney
Reviews.Content: Thank you for the fast shipping and the great product. I purchased this for my son's bedroom and he uses it to watch TV and play his video games and thoroughly enjoys it.

Reviews.Title: TV was great. Just didn't ship my remote
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: This TV is a pretty good deal, but the TV wasn't shipped with an remote. They gave me batteries but seemed to forget the rest. The TV itself has pretty good display, and the two HDMI ports are pretty useful.

Reviews.Title: Good product so far.
Reviews.Author: shop for thing
Reviews.Content: Works good, follow the user reviews on how to make it look better.  I use hdmi pc, hdmi xbox, and colorstream component for tv since i don't get hd anyway.  All audio comes from whatever input so i got to do away with my analog audio switch.  I'm a big gamer and would prefer a 40 inch 1080p screen but that is 180 bucks more.  This is a good buy for a  mid size room, or anyone wanting to upgrade for cheap.  I'd get a samsung or toshiba 40 inch 1080p if i was willing to spend the money.  250 bucks this is a great deal.  I also praise toshiba for the color output, it's like eyecandy.  I barely see any other brands this vivid.

Reviews.Title: no complaints
Reviews.Author: Amanda Spillman
Reviews.Content: It is a good TV for the price. It arrived promptly and was easy to set up and I do not have any complaints. I would recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Angela Fulton
Reviews.Content: Great, clear picture. The sound quality is nice and overall this is a huge improvement over my last tv. It was also easy to assemble out of the box

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: K. Phelps "Desert Rat"
Reviews.Content: The people that are griping about the picture on this TV are nuts!!!  Take 10 or 15 minutes to play around with thesettings and you will get a great picture! I find the sound to be better then average too.  This is my 3rd Toshibatelevision. The other two are about 5 years old and cost much more. The picture on this TV is just as good, if not better.In fact the sound is better on this TV then the others.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Rebecca Lindner
Reviews.Content: It works great. it was easy to set up . Best wedding gift my first time on amazon and not my last

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Jim Lampariello
Reviews.Content: I'm extremely happy with this TV.  The picture quality is bright and clear, comparable to more expensive TVs.  Five stars all the way.

Reviews.Title: Good Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: vmcferrin
Reviews.Content: Good clear pic.  Prior reviews informed me how to get that dynamic picture by turning off the brightness.  Sound good. Side view makes color look blurred, but overall this is a good TV.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: JM
Reviews.Content: I've been using this TV for several months now and am quite happy with it. The picture quality is good for the price. The speakers/volume are pretty good for the price also. It works well as a second tv.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased so far, great picture, great price
Reviews.Author: J. Copeland "JCinLV"
Reviews.Content: I have only had this TV a short time so I cannot comment on it's reliability however I like most everything else about it. The price at $249 was a major selling point. We have it in the kitchen/dining and I wanted something nice that was reasonably priced at around 32". It is hooked up to basic cable and picked up all the local HD channels without any problem. I can also use it when I have clients in and I want to show them projects that are on my computer or on the Internet. I just plug into the HDMI port on the TV and on my laptop and i get an exact duplicate of my computer screen, with sound, on the large tv screen. Also makes watching videos on your computer more enjoyable.  You can adjust the picture color and quality for each of the different inputs which is really nice.  I can also load up a flash drive with hundreds of photos and it will play through them in a slide show format with a music track if I want.Only negative I can see is that you need to be viewing pretty much straight on for a really great picture quality. I guess the sound could be better but it doesn't bother me.I recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: bang for the buck
Reviews.Author: Donald V. Beckwith "DONGOLF101"
Reviews.Content: GREAT TV BEST BANG FOR THE BUCK, YES TURN THE AUTO BRIGHTNESS OFF MUCH BETTER PIC. I HAVE ALWAYS HAD GOOD LUCK WITH TOSHIBA, BOTH IN TV'S AND COMPUTERS. DON'T HESITATE TO BUY THEM. YOU CAN HARDLY BEAT THIS PRICE AND GET THIS QUALITY....DON

Reviews.Title: Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: Rez 56
Reviews.Content: I needed a 32" HDTV for our workout room that didn't have to have all the bells and whistles.  The Toshiba 32C120U fits the application perfectly.  Great set for a great price and Toshiba has good quality.  Usually buy either LG or Samsung, but this set was $60-80 less than the others with great picture and sound. All in all, I am very happy.

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: Reebill
Reviews.Content: great tv for kids room works well and has good sound and picture quality is sharp the only thing it does not come with a book on how to change the setting

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: mcf343
Reviews.Content: Got a great deal on this TV compared to local stores.  This is a TV for my den/office and its perfect.  Good picture quality and really easy to set up for cable.  Inputs for just about everything.

Reviews.Title: wonderful friend...e
Reviews.Author: dave
Reviews.Content: I am in love with my new Toshiba ... i didn't even need to buy a sound bar for the volume it isso lovely. dp

Reviews.Title: For the price, a good TV
Reviews.Author: ann
Reviews.Content: I had the same problem initially as others regarding the dark picture.  Once I followed the directions to make it brighter I was pleased.

Reviews.Title: Good inexpensive T.V.
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: Purchased this T.V. as in inexpensive bedroom T.V. Had it for a couple weeks now and have been very happy with it. Very impressed with how quickly Amazon delivered this T.V. Ordered it on friday and it was on my door step monday afternoon.

Reviews.Title: Good deal
Reviews.Author: C. E. Phillips "Reader"
Reviews.Content: An excellent tv for the price. It fits wonderfully into our bedroom. Subprisingly good picture and light in weight.  Remote works well.

Reviews.Title: WOW.. Great LCD TV
Reviews.Author: James White
Reviews.Content: This is a really descent LCD TV at a fair price.Things I  like about this TV include:-  it has two HDMI inputs;-  it has a stable, easy-to-connect stand;-  easy access to A/V in and out ports;-  crisp, bright video colors.Things that could be better include:-  a higher HDMI resolution;-  a more impact-resistance cabinet.

Reviews.Title: Good Value.  Not great sound
Reviews.Author: Mark J. Meckler
Reviews.Content: Installed in my home gym for workout videos.  Great picture.  Only downside is that it didn't come with an HDMI cable for connection to my video player.  Also, the sound quality is pretty low.  I use it in a small room and don't need a lot of volume, so no big deal, but if this were in a living room of decent size, I'd be worried about the sound quality.

Reviews.Title: Great blacks!
Reviews.Author: William G. Haver "Lawnman"
Reviews.Content: I think the overriding complaint most have with an LCD TV is the backlight problem in blacks. This TV is great for deep blacks. And, when there is a dark part of a movie it doesn't make EVERYTHING have to go dark to keep the blacks - black!The only problem I had was an Amazon problem. I ordered the unit and within the hour of my having it in my Shopping cart the price got lower on the site BUT NOT in my cart! So, watch your item to see if the price drops BEFORE you hit Order!

Reviews.Title: Really good but not the best
Reviews.Author: mmmmmatt
Reviews.Content: It is really good for a bedroom. Great quality and size for the price that I paid for it. The only thing that I wish was better is the sound. I suggest looking into a surround sound system to go along with this tv if you are planning to buy it. Other than that I give it a 4 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32-inch 720p HDTV
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Perdue
Reviews.Content: I've always been well satisfied with the value of Toshiba electronics. For the price conscious,this HDTV is a good value.Great picture,intuative setup,and unbeatable price with Amazon's free shipping.Remote has a little cheap feeling,but does the job.Set takes a couple of seconds longer than my higher end TV's for "warm up". (picture does not immediately display on power activation.)But for under $250,for a bedroom TV,I'm more than satisfied.I'm very happy with this choice.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted
Reviews.Author: yankee
Reviews.Content: After shopping around for a good quality television at the right price to get me through four years of college, I half-heartedly decided on the Toshiba because one of my floormates already had an identical model in good condition.  The T.V. is perfect, exactly as advertised and I have experienced no problems to date.

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: ou lil "DirtMonkey"
Reviews.Content: has adjustable picture size and color, brightness, contrast, etc. also preset modes to select from. Sound is adequate, placing it near wall and or corner to reflect sound improves it.

Reviews.Title: toshiba 32c120u
Reviews.Author: Cassie
Reviews.Content: Was skeptical about buying a television online but for the price I really couldn't have gotten a better product. The picture is clear and the sound is good. Hdmi works great on it and all in all is a good television.

Reviews.Title: This is a great buy.
Reviews.Author: grandma of 3
Reviews.Content: Funny how life is but one tv after another starting going out.  My husband bought a tv from Amazon 1080 LED larger than my 32-Inch Toshiba.  Honestly, my Toshiba shows better my husband also admitted it.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32"
Reviews.Author: Pamela J. King "PamK"
Reviews.Content: This Toshiba 32" TV was a gift for my Mom.  She loves it.  The price for this TV was  the BEST part of buying it.

Reviews.Title: Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Margarette McGathey
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived quickly and was well packaged. The sound and picture are both very good. If I needed another TV I would buy this Toshiba.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba 32" TV
Reviews.Author: Mike1sc "Michael D. Smith"
Reviews.Content: This tv was purchased due to the previous reviews that had been written and that the cost was more reasonable than any other 32" tvs I could find at the time.  This tv is used at a football tailgating site and works exactly like it is supposed to.  Great picture and adequate volume.  No negative issues.

Reviews.Title: Boyfriend loves it
Reviews.Author: sara
Reviews.Content: I got the for my boyfriend as a birthday gift. He's using it as a monitor for his computer. It seems to work perfectly and has all the right plug-ins for his tech stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great product for the price
Reviews.Author: Jesse K
Reviews.Content: This is a great LCD 720p TV for price and size range.  It has an easy setup and works well in bright light conditions.  The installation on a Vesa 200 wall mount was simple and buttons are easy to access on let side.

Reviews.Title: GREAT LCD
Reviews.Author: ROBERT R GRAY JR
Reviews.Content: EXCELLENT TV FOR ANY ROOM. PICTURE IS GREAT ONCE YOU ADJUST THE POWER SAVING AND AUTO BRIGHTNESS TO THR OFF POSITION. FOR THE PRICE, I DONT THINK YOU CAN FIND A BETTER DEAL. I PURCHASED THIS TV FOR MY MOTHER AND SHE LOVES IT. SHE COMMENTS ON HOW CLEAR THE PIC. IS.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv to buy
Reviews.Author: kami electronics
Reviews.Content: Name brand, Good product and Good looking, It has nice picture, and it works long time,and not too many defective, we love it at kamielectronics.com

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: rosie rockingchair
Reviews.Content: ordered a tv on thursdat evening and it was delivered on friday love the size of my toshiba hdtv only problem was there was no screws to atach the base to the screen a trip to the hardware solved this problem

Reviews.Title: EXACTLY as ordered!
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for a third bedroom my vacation  home.  It has an excellent picture for a 720 DPI TV.  Easy to navigate.  The primary use for this Toshiba is to view local TV and watch movies via ROKU. It'll be used, at most, a 10 to 15 hours a month, maybe less.  EXACTLY what I wanted.  Excellent value!While I know it didn't arrive the day I ordered it, it sure seemed like it!  Thanks for great service.

Reviews.Title: Good 32" TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Smart Suzie "Frugal Shopper"
Reviews.Content: First TV received with broken screen.  Was replaced within a couple of days.  Good experience overall.  TV is just fine with only one annoying issue.  It is so slow going between channels. You wouldn't think it would be a big issue but it is annoying.  Color, sound, etc. are all just great.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, especially for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amanda H.
Reviews.Content: When Father's Day came around this year I knew that I wanted a TV for my husband. He always gets the short straw when it comes to the TV (with three kids it's just the way it goes!) I saw this model at Sears and loved the picture. I checked it out here on Amazon and was thrilled to see that it had wonderful reviews and was MUCH less expensive. I ordered it right away and my husband loves it!

Reviews.Title: Good picture, no written help
Reviews.Author: behags
Reviews.Content: Had the television up and running in less than 15 minutes. Found the screen adjustments easy enough and made a few changes to create a better picture. Problems hooking up the WII -- the set comes with no printed manual, so we had to go online and search for help from user forums. Had a hard time even finding a pdf of an owner's manual online. Being used in a bedroom -- should be fine for this purpose.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase!
Reviews.Author: Deborah Tucker
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Toshiba 32" for my downstairs apartment, my tenant is very happy with it.  The picture is clear, the price was right, and Amazon service is the best.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Purchase
Reviews.Author: RobertVM
Reviews.Content: Purchased this flat screen for a bedroom.  Nice picture, nice sound.Had already seen the TV at a box store, and it had beautiful clarity and great sound.I received it quickly from Amazon, and only have positive comments to share.  My other two flat panels are Samsung (which I also highly rate).  This particular TV is upstairs, so I have it connected to a RCA Antenna (no cable set top box in this room) - and that set up works great in my area (north Jersey) receiving about 20 clear, English channels.Bottom line:  It's a TV that works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Toshiba TV
Reviews.Author: B. Webb
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Toshiba to replace my old TV. I really love this TV it is like almost being in a movie theater with the big screen. I am very happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV ecspecially for the price!
Reviews.Author: W. Shaw "WS"
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure what to expect for the price of this unit. I was more than pleasantly surprised by the picture quality and sound. Very good TV!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV for a bedroom!
Reviews.Author: apsucheme09
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV as a gift for my mom who needed a new TV in her bedroom.  I did fix the sound based on the previous reviews and now it works perfectly! Definitely worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Fits the need in my garage
Reviews.Author: John Bender
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this model.  Its hardy enough to be set up im my garage workshop and I really like the sound and high definition display.  It seems to pick up 1080i, but not 1080p, when it is classed as a 720p.  All good with ease of use and for the price as good as you can expect.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the Price
Reviews.Author: Angela
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my son's bedroom and we are very pleased with the picture and sound quality.  I followed the directions posted by another reviewer on how to turn off the energy saver and that made a big difference.  Even games look great, though extreme gamers may want to go with an 1080p.  Would highly recommend this for the amazing price.

Reviews.Title: We bought this TV as a gift and they lve it.
Reviews.Author: Pablo242
Reviews.Content: We bought this TV as a gift and they love it. Great price, great product. This is our second LCD from Amazon and I know I will be getting another one from them soon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!! Looks and sounds better than others at it's size!
Reviews.Author: mick
Reviews.Content: Great for a bedroom TV.  DVDs look and sound great.  Would recommend to anyone looking for a great tv for a great price!!!

Reviews.Title: Poor picture compared to Samsung
Reviews.Author: I. Novick
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV because of the low price and favorable reviews of its picture quality.  The picture was in fact washed out, dim, with poor colors.  No adjustment I could make made any difference.  The viewing angle is extremely narrow and the picture deteriorated even further with the slightest off center angle.  Would suggest the Samsung UN32EH5000 which is $120 more, but has a great picture right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, speakers died in weeks
Reviews.Author: John Thomas
Reviews.Content: I did a lot of Amazon research on a smaller tv for my weight room.  This had really good reviews so I bought it.  Hardly used it, and a few weeks in the speakers just stopped working.  Not the kind of hassle I need.  The picture is good, but my concerns about overall quality would make me not recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Got this for my sister to replace her old 32", 4:3, CRT Sony
Reviews.Author: Coi Laman
Reviews.Content: A great TV, a great value for the money and has some unexpectedly powerful sound out of its tiny speakers. However, my sister will be using her Philips CSS2123B/F7 'soundbar with the subwoofer' system to take care of the audio duties for this TV. Philips is a killer system and a way better audio device than any built-in TV speaker by a far margin and for so little money to boot. I got the Philips soundbar system for $89 on sale last Christmas, but not here on Amazon.Now, let's talk about this Toshiba. The Toshiba really shines in the picture quality department, but you must turn off that dreadful 'Energy Saving' thing in the 'Preferences' because it dims the picture way too much. Picture tweaking over several days with different program material will further improve the picture quality and you can really tune the picture of this TV to your personal taste. The only caveat is that you only have one custom preset on this TV so you will be a bit challenged to find a happy medium for all your devices connected to it, but it is doable and my sister loves the picture from all sources.Also, if you are not buying any external speakers, make sure you are getting the best possible sound out of its built-in speakers because that is definitely possible. Go into the TV's AUDIO settings and change the default setting from 'Dolby Digital to 'PCM'. The 'PCM' setting will give you the clear, dynamic and uncompressed stereo audio from your TV's speakers and the sound will be much improved over the default 'Dolby Digital' setting. Just remember that Dolby Digital is always compressed and that's why PCM mode sounds better with those tiny TV speakers. Enjoy your TV everybody!

Reviews.Content: The TV was OK.  It seems comparable to any other budget 32" flatscreen TV. Ultra-Quiet Air Purifier - Stylish, Efficient and Energy Star® Certified, Wall-Mountable!, White, Pet Allegy whenever I used the number buttons or the up/down navigation buttons.  It would turn on/off, change the speed, change the mood light, make it make sounds, etc.  It was meant to be a bedroom TV and that's where the air purifier lives.  I tried covering the IR sensor with a piece of tape, but it turns out the IR sensor was used as an ambient light sensor, which means that if the purifier was in "automatic" mode, which is where I keep it most of the time, it would shut off within 5 minutes of covering the sensor, which is what you want if you're trying to sleep.The second major flaw (for me) was that after putting it up my wife reallllly wanted it to be as close to the wall as possible, but the cable connections are on the back, oriented towards the wall, so right angle adapters would need to be bought (not available locally), and it would still be very awkward.Instead I bought a VIZIO E321VT 32-Inch 720p 60Hz LED-Lit TV for the same price ($250) locally, which doesn't have a remote that makes my air purifier go crazy and has the connections facing downwards and to the side, which makes it easier to mount flush to the wall.  I've been happy with it so far.

After 30 minutes on the phone with the Customer Service Rep, he wasn't sure it was the remote or TV. After trying the batteries that came with the remote and my own new batteries, the problems did not go away. He suggested ME not him, going online to order a new remote that would take about 5 days to get, and if that didn't work, a tech would come to my home. When I talked with the Customer Service Supervisor in Asia, he suggested I go online to order a new remote that would take 4 or 5 days to get. I asked why I couldn't go to a local dealer to get a remote and that wasn't an option. When I asked why Customer Service could not go online and order the remote for me. According to him, that wasn't an option. I told him his options were NOT an option for me. Toshiba in the future is NOT a selection for me. Now you know why I say run or run faster from this TV.The best part about this experience is how well Amazon handled the process of me returning the TV. I ended up buying a Philips 32" TV that was a breeze to set up and operate.
